text: Super excited to welcome our new investors @SalesforceVC, @Google, @amazon, @nvidia, @AMD, @intel, @QualcommVenture, @IBM & @sound_ventures_ who all participated in @huggingface’s $235M series D at a $4.5B valuation to celebrate the crossing of 1,000,000 models, datasets and apps…

Qwen7bV2 is the best coding model you can run privately & not bad at other tasks either (llama8b styling still better for emails/summaries). Tested well at 30k context.  Quantized properly from bf16 + imatrix. Embedding/Output combos included for research. https://huggingface.co/nisten/qwenv2-7b-inst-imatrix-gguf/tree/main

Want $500k in funding?   I’ve met and interviewed with probably every top accelerator you can think of:  - YC - SPC - HF0 - Pear - Betaworks  In February of this year I accepted $500k from Betaworks to build our agentic vision of the future for infra.   I got to meet some of the…

👏 Hats off to Wenbo Pan for creating Faro Yi 9B DPO! With 200K context in just 16GB VRAM, it's a game-changer for efficient AI.   Dive into Wenbo’s impressive work on @huggingface here: https://huggingface.co/wenbopan/Faro-Yi-9B-DPO
I 🩷 Hugging Face Universe 😎 hf.co/spaces/Chunte/HFBA
For those wondering, "june-chatbot" on @lmsysorg is exactly this model posted on @huggingface https://huggingface.co/nvidia/Nemotron-4-340B-Instruct

Depth Anything V2 just released, enabling real-time depth estimation directly in your browser with 🤗 Transformers.js and WebGPU acceleration! ⚡️  The smallest model is only ~50MB (@ fp16), making it perfect for on-device usage! 😍  Check out the demo (+ source code) 👇

Did you miss that @Stanford open-sourced a humanoid robot dataset? We just made it available on @huggingface hub to allow everyone to train their own humanoid robot with LeRobot: github.com/huggingface/lerob… Here is a cool visualization with @rerundotio. More in this thread 🧵
Meet the new monster in town: Nemotron-4 by @NVIDIAAI, featuring 340 billion parameters!    Get them while their hot on @huggingface🔥
We're excited to welcome @argilla_io to the Hugging Face team! 🤗 ￼ Time to democratise good Machine Learning, one dataset at a time! ⚡️

Open source is stronger than ever!   According to @ClementDelangue @huggingface surpassed 1M models mark (private and public)   Out which, 715K are open-source 🔥  Additionally, you have access to 162K datasets 🙌🏾

Yi-1.5 has received over 70k+ downloads in the past month, and over 300 models have been created so far 🙌   We're thrilled to see such incredible adoption. A huge thanks to our fantastic community for making this possible. Let’s keep building together 🔥  https://huggingface.co/models?search=yi-1.5

✨ Introducing 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐧𝐕𝐋𝐀 — an open-source vision-language-action model for robotics! 👐  - SOTA generalist policy - 7B params - outperforms Octo, RT-2-X on zero-shot evals 🦾 - trained on 970k episodes from OpenX dataset 🤖 - fully open: model/code/data all online 🤗  🧵👇

In less than 48 hours, our Stable Diffusion 3 hit 2.69M downloads and tops the ImgSys leaderboard. Huge 🙌 to our @StabilityAI teams — past, present, and future — for continuing to share great tech with the world. It's an uphill journey, but an important one.

The beauty of open-source: as a user, you can poke at things and find improvements on what matters to you 💛  Like Cyril Vallez, whose first contribution to🤗 transformers was to halve (!) the memory consumption of `generate` to everyone 🤯
everything about multimodal AI in 12 mins, let's go
🥳 Asked for it in 2023, got it in 2024: @argilla_io has joined @huggingface!   Get ready for lots of amazing data-centric tooling and open datasets!

Inspired by @karpathy 's latest "Let's Build GPT2", I trained a GPT2 model to generate audio. dont think its good enough to call it 'GPT2o' but it was funny.  code, model, dataset all on @huggingface but not sure if you want to use it lol. Will train for longer next time.  1/2
Well, that was fast! We led Argilla’s seed round in September and they already have been acquired by our friends at @huggingface  Huge congrats to the Argilla and Huggingface teams!

an AI scoop from me on a foggy SF thursday that i thought was friday: @huggingface founder clem delangue told me that he's hearing from *10 AI startups per week* who want to sell themselves to the company. also! HF bought an AI startup, @argilla_io! https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-06-13/more-ai-founders-looking-to-sell-startups-hugging-face-ceo-says?srnd=technology-vp

🔥@argilla_io is joining @huggingface 🤗 Time to double down on community, data, and open source AI!  So proud of the team, so excited to join a larger mission and amazing company  Special thanks to @osanseviero for being such a great partner during the acquisition!…

Today is a big day for Argilla and the Open Source AI community:     We’re joining @huggingface🤗 !    Time to double down on community and data-centric, open source AI  Read all about it and ask questions:  https://huggingface.co/posts/dvilasuero/203008804842390

🔥 I've created a little utility to convert a PDF into an HF dataset. 100% online thanks to @Gradio. It saves me a lot of time. Happy to share!  https://huggingface.co/spaces/pdf2dataset/pdf2dataset

WOW! 🤯 Transformers.js is currently the #1 trending repo on GitHub this week, gaining over 1,000 new stars! ⭐️ Thank you all for your support! I can't wait to show you what's next! 🚀  P.S. We're almost at 10k, so add a star if you haven't already! 🤗👇

In case you didn't know: open-source AI powers all AI!

Just in case you had any doubts about the utility of OSS in mainstream AI applications, here’s a slide from an Apple developer session today. A heavy reliance on OS efforts with @huggingface at the forefront. Happy to have played a small part in this!

Yesterday Apple strongly advocated for on-device AI with @Apple  Intelligence! Today, we know they will run ~3B LLM on device (Mac, iPhone, iPad) using fine-tuned LoRA Adapters for different tasks, claiming to outperform other 7B and 3B LLMs! 👀  What we know:  📱 On-device 3B…
Who said you can't build a big business based on open-source AI? Congrats team @MistralAI (tens of millions of downloads from https://huggingface.co/mistralai)!

seems that Apple trained a "original GPT4"ish level performance model for servers. * Beating DBRX Instruct + Mistral 8x22b by a lot isn't super easy, but also not that hard with $$$ * Loses to current GPT4 Turbo, many models do  The on-device model makes sense that they would…
This talk from Apple is the best ad for fine tuning that probably exists.  They are also using adapters (and hot swapping IIUC)

We added idefics2 and idefics2-chatty to the Unsolvable Problem Detection Leaderboard. 🚀 This benchmark was developed to measure the robustness of VLMs by asking them questions about images that cannot be answered. #MachineLearning #AI #NLP 🧵
Run CoreML models on the Neural Engine seamlessly.  Introducing deCoreML 🍎

Open source is built on a recognition that some foundational tools and technologies can accomplish vastly more if ubiquitous. This is true of AI where legions of academics and enthusiasts are sharing and advancing the state of the art of open models while proprietary ones stay…
InstantMesh leading the 3D leaderboard (chatbot arena for 3D). Vote here: https://huggingface.co/spaces/dylanebert/3d-arena
⚡️ 3D News ⚡️  The official @huggingface 3D Arena Leaderboard has launched 🚀  The #1 right now is InstantMesh @xinntao   Go vote. https://huggingface.co/spaces/dylanebert/3d-arena
On-device AI may be a good idea 🤔

Some days you have great days doing open source work.  Other days you read one issue and your whole day is just borked emotionally.  Remember that OSS maintainers are people too, who (may) have jobs, that can't do everything under the sun like we would like 💔

Here's another shameless plug for @huggingface's global and distributed work.  My partner has business in Honolulu this week and I love love love that I didn't even have to consider whether or not I could join him on this trip. It's my first time in Hawaii and I'm having a blast!
The unsaid star of WWDC & Apple  pip install mlx and get access to plethora of multimodal, audio and LLMs (fully open source)  https://github.com/ml-explore/mlx
More evidence that all companies will not only rely on third-party LLM APIs but also build their own models for their own constraints (here smaller, specialized on-device models)!

A challenge of open-source is that it gets way less credit and publicity than it deserves. The Apple intelligence announcement is a good example of that: instead of "Apple adds chatgpt integration", the headlines should be "Apple uses open-source AI to build Apple intelligence…

This is from Apple's State of the Union  The local model is a 3B parameter SLM that uses adapters trained for each specific feature. Diffusion model does the same thing, adapter for each style.  Anything running locally or Apple's Secure Cloud is an Apple model, not OpenAI.
“When you're playing a point, it has to be the most important thing in the world. And it is. But when it's behind you, it's behind you.” - @rogerfederer

Love how @Apple is advocating for on-device AI at WWDC . Local, smaller, specialized models are the future of private, secure and efficient AI.

We are now available on @huggingface as one of the approved Local Apps which means now you can launch any models in Msty directly from within HuggingFace.  Please do us a favor and set Msty as your favorite Local App in your HF settings. We know it already is your favorite app :)

Along with our Flash Diffusion paper, we release a @huggingface space and open-source implementation supporting custom models.  🏎️ Accelerate your own model with our codebase: https://github.com/gojasper/flash-diffusion  🎨 Generate 1024x1024 images in a sec with our demo: https://huggingface.co/spaces/jasperai/flash-diffusion

🤗 Even if you live under a rock, you should know LeRobot, the first library at @huggingface Robotics 🤖!  𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗘-𝗢𝗙-𝗧𝗛𝗘-𝗔𝗥𝗧 𝗠𝗔𝗖𝗛𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗥𝗡𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗟-𝗪𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗗 𝗥𝗢𝗕𝗢𝗧𝗜𝗖𝗦  🤗 LeRobot offers tools, models, and datasets for real-world…

This is a big deal for us. When it comes to AI models, there is nothing like HuggingFace. It's popularity is massive! This should help more people discover Msty and realize how they were living without it all this time :)
Excited to be part of the @huggingface local apps family!  🤝

I used #lerobot's diffusion policy implementation to figure out if spatial softmax learns semantically sensible keypoints. Short answer: no. Here's my short writeup with animated visualizations: https://github.com/alexander-soare/little_experiments/blob/main/diffusion_spatial_softmax.md

A second batch of local Generative AI apps are now live on compatible model pages on @huggingface  🔥  Welcome to the family, friends 🥰

Instantly replace OpenAI with llama.cpp server, now with Python.  Llamanet now supports Python. In this video I take the basic Gradio OpenAI chat app from Huggingface https://www.gradio.app/guides/creating-a-chatbot-fast and add 1 line, and it's running locally with Phi-3 over llama.cpp.  cc: @ggerganov

Introducing Whisper WebGPU: Blazingly-fast ML-powered speech recognition directly in your browser! 🚀 It supports multilingual transcription and translation across 100 languages! 🤯  The model runs locally, meaning no data leaves your device! 😍  Check it out (+ source code)! 👇
github.com/huggingface/lerob… is trending for the second time! What do you think of the codebase and documentation so far?

"I want AI to do my laundry and dishes so that I can do art and writing", not the other way around. @huggingface: OK!  https://venturebeat.com/ai/hugging-face-and-pollen-robotics-show-off-first-project-an-open-source-robot-that-does-chores/

Hugging Face and Pollen Robotics show off first project: an open source robot that does chores https://venturebeat.com/ai/hugging-face-and-pollen-robotics-show-off-first-project-an-open-source-robot-that-does-chores/

📢 Introducing iso3d - Isolated Synthetic Objects 3D https://huggingface.co/datasets/dylanebert/iso3d  a dataset for qualitative image-to-3d evaluation  this will be a part of the larger upcoming 3d arena leaderboard. 📢 stay tuned 🎶

SB 1047 bill, assigning liability for unintended use to model developers, is total idiocy. No thought given to how this will cripple open source and weaken CA’s position as the global heart of innovation.
The US is going to lose its leadership in AI if it doesn't support more open research and open-source AI!
open-source models growing super strong!

It's finally possible: real-time in-browser speech recognition with OpenAI Whisper! 🤯 The model runs fully on-device using Transformers.js and ONNX Runtime Web, and supports multilingual transcription across 100 different languages! 🔥  Check out the demo (+ source code)! 👇

💎Coming to the next release of @huggingface TGI: support for Marlin.  ⚡ Marlin is a highly-optimized kernel for FP16xINT4 matrix multiplication by @elias_frantar and @DAlistarh to speed up models with 4-bit quantized weights.

Hugging Face Embedding Container for @awscloud  SageMaker is now generally available! Improve and simplify your embedding creation for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications. 🚀  What's new 🆕: 🔥 Supports popular architectures: BERT, RoBERTa, XLM-RoBERTa, @nomic_ai…

We made Reachy2 from @pollenrobotics autonomously doing household chores and interacting with us. It can move its full body, including its neck. Even the dog was impressed! 🐶 You can do the same at home on smaller robots with github.com/huggingface/lerob… and github.com/dora-rs/dora

The Open LLM Leaderboard passed 2 million unique visitors since last October!  Thanks a lot to the community coming to take a look :)  https://huggingface.co/spaces/open-llm-leaderboard/open_llm_leaderboard

Together with @huggingface , we embraced "Repetition" as we teleoperated Reachy through the same task hundreds of times. This effort aims to enable the robot to master the task autonomously using an end-to-end model. More info on Reachy 2 here: https://discord.gg/96NgJEmrgJ
